text: Castrocaro Terme e Terra del Sole is a comune in the Province of Forlì-Cesena in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. The comune has three small towns: Castrocaro, Pieve Salutare and Terra del Sole. Castrocaro is a famous spa town. == References == Category:Settlements in Forlì-Cesena Category:Spa towns in Italy
title: Castrocaro Terme e Terra del Sole
